trans-unit.source: Provides a reference to the type of adapter to be used in the designer.
trans-unit.target: 提供配置器類型的參考，可用於設計工具中。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: Use this attribute to associate a type of adapter with your control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性與控制項關聯的配接器類型。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DesignerAdapterAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DesignerAdapterAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type of adapter.
trans-unit.target: 配置器類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DesignerAdapterAttribute" /> class using the name of the type of adapter.
trans-unit.target: 使用配置器類型的名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DesignerAdapterAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of adapter
trans-unit.target: 配置器的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DesignerAdapterAttribute" /> class using the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of adapter.
trans-unit.target: 使用配置器的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DesignerAdapterAttribute" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the associated type of adapter.
trans-unit.target: 傳回關聯的配置器類型名稱。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.target: 關聯配置器類型的名稱。
